about_the_game:
Game Introduction

A survival adventure unfolds like a board game on a deserted island!
Cast Dice Away is a unique, board game-style survival adventure where players strive to survive and escape an uninhabited island. Rolling the dice to explore and survive, this game combines strategic elements of board games with the tension of the survival genre.

To survive on this island, you must manage hunger, stamina, and illness while exploring various areas and gathering resources. Solve randomly occurring challenges by rolling the dice and interacting with NPCs to improve your chances of survival!

Key Features

  • Dice-Based Board Game Style: Roll the dice to explore, gather resources, and engage in battles. Events and battles unfold according to your dice rolls, allowing you to increase your survival chances through a blend of luck and strategy.

  • Resource Management and Survival Strategy: Gather various resources like wood, grass, stones, and mushrooms to craft weapons and armor, light fires to ward off wolves, and develop essential survival strategies through careful resource management and planning.

  • Diverse Exploration Zones: Explore different environments—jungles, coasts, forests, and underground dungeons—each offering unique resources and challenges. Use the characteristics of each area to devise optimal survival strategies.

  • Unique NPCs and Quests: Interact with distinctive NPCs to gain support, complete new quests, and earn rewards. You’ll also engage in battles and form alliances with the island’s animals to survive.

  • Endless Survival Challenges: Experience the thrill of survival with various threats, including changing weather, hunger, disease, and wolf ambushes, bringing the tension of a board game and the excitement of survival together.

  • Powerful Items and Artifacts: Enhance your character and upgrade your equipment with artifacts obtained through exploration, adding depth and diversity to your survival and adventure.

Are You Ready to Survive on This Island?

Cast Dice Away captures the charm of board games while delivering the thrill of survival. Explore different areas, face powerful boss monsters, and experience the exciting balance between luck and strategy as you roll the dice and use items. Will you endure the harsh environment of this island until the very end?

Roll the dice now and embark on your journey of survival!

name: Cast Dice Away

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2 cores
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: VRAM 2GB
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 4 cores
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: VRAM 4GB
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: A board game-style survival adventure on a deserted island! In Cast Dice Away, roll dice to explore the island, gather resources, and survive. Each roll triggers unpredictable events, challenging you to strategically navigate diverse environments as you seek escape.
